member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current item is expanded or not, if it is a parent node (i.e. has child items). This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter
member.summary: Converts custom node items to a collection of OrganizationalChartItem objects (as required by Items properties of OrganizationalChartView component). Use *Member properties of the converter instance to control which properties of custom items are bound to which OrganizationalChartItem properties (undefined/null Member values indicate properties that are not bound and default values are automatically generated for these properties on OrganizationalChartItem objects instead). The converter uses reflection to retreive the appropriate property values from your custom data objects and apply them to the corresponding OrganizationalChartItem instances. Referred member properties of custom items should be public and accessible for reading and optionally writing (property paths are not supported). Set UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges and/or UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges properties to true/false to indicate the directions of internally managed change updates. Note that UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges works only when the custom data source implements INotifyCollectionChanged interface and/or custom data objects implement INotifyPropertyChanged interface. When UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges is set new objects that need to be created are generated by Activator.CreateInstance internal calls, and therefore they need to provide public access to their parameterless constructor (or their default constructor).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.ContentMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that Content property of OrganizationalChartItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property may be of any type (including string). This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.IndentationMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that Indentation property of OrganizationalChartItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property need to be of integral type. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.IsExpandedMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that IsExpanded property of OrganizationalChartItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property need to be of Boolean type. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data source is automatically updated when target OrganizationalChartItem objects generated by the converter get their internally bound values changed. Set this property to false when the feature is not needed, e.g. when the user interface is read only (by default it is set to true in order to automatically propagate changes back to the data source as expected in most situations). This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether target OrganizationalChartItem objects generated by the converter are automatically updated when internally bound data source values change. Set this property to true only when the feature is needed, i.e. when code behind changes the data source while the user interface presents it and all changes should be automatically reflected on screen (by default it is set to false in order to provide increased performance). Note that automatic updates work only when the custom data source implements INotifyCollectionChanged interface and/or custom data objects implement INotifyPropertyChanged interface. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts custom node items to a collection of OrganizationalChartItem objects (as required by Items properties of OrganizationalChartView component).

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Throws a not supported exception as two way conversion is internally implemented and may be configured using the UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges and UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges properties of the converter.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.OrganizationalChartView
member.summary: Displays hierarchical data in a customizable organizational chart based on ItemsControl control.

member.summary: Initializes a new OrganizationalChartView instance.

member.summary: Builds the visual tree for the OrganizationalChartView when a new template is applied and updates appropriate internal properties of the control.

member.summary: Identifies the Items dependency property.

member.summary: Gets a collection of OrganizationalChartItem objects that represent the individual items in the OrganizationalChartView control. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Attaches the specified item to this control instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.OrganizationalChartView.BeginUpdateItems
member.summary: Signals the beginning of a set of updates within the items collection, in order to temporarily remove automatic user interface refreshes during this time, for optimization purposes. When the updates are complete, call method to refresh the user inteface and to revert to its standard behavior.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.OrganizationalChartView.EndUpdateItems
member.summary: Signals the end of a set of updates within the items collection initiated by a call, in order to refresh the user interface.
